metadata.purpose: Agent-readable archive index for efficient historical referencing
metadata.update_frequency: Updated automatically during archive compression cycles
metadata.access_policy: Read-only for historical reference; modifications require archive integrity verification

.pyc.description: Python compiled bytecode cache from __pycache__ directories
.pyc.purpose: Historical record of Python module compilation states

.py.description: Python source files (temporary scripts and utilities)
.py.agent_action: Search for specific utility functions or patterns

.md.agent_action: Reference for compliance history and decision rationale

.txt.purpose: Backup copies of configuration and documentation

by_file_type.example: Search for all diagnosis-related files: grep 'diagnosis' ARCHIVE_INDEX.json

by_purpose.code_archaeology: Search .py files for specific utility implementations
by_purpose.compliance_history: Search .md files for policy decisions and rationale
by_purpose.configuration_snapshots: .txt and .json files for system state recovery

agent_queries.find_script: List all Python development scripts in archive
agent_queries.find_docs: List all documentation and policy files
agent_queries.timeline: Files grouped by apparent creation/modification period

debugging_scripts.significance: Development tools for code quality and issue diagnosis

policy_documentation.significance: Historical record of compliance decisions and policy evolution
policy_documentation.relevance: Reference for understanding current policies and their rationale

python_cache.significance: Complete module import history and dependency states
use_cases: Track which Python modules were active during specific periods
Identify dependency changes and version updates
Recover module implementations from compiled bytecode

temporal_markers.bytecode_timestamps: Multiple .pyc files with timestamps from 2025-11-11 indicate recent compilation cycle
temporal_markers.documentation_dates: Policy files represent snapshot of compliance state at archival time
temporal_markers.script_artifacts: Development scripts preserved from active development phases

recovery_scenarios.find_specific_implementation: Query .py files for function/class definitions; decompress .pyc if source unavailable
recovery_scenarios.trace_dependency_chain: Analyze .pyc files and import statements from archived .py files
recovery_scenarios.recover_configuration: Refer to .txt and .json files for system state snapshots
recovery_scenarios.compliance_audit: Review .md files for historical policy decisions and justifications

recommended_queries.import_analysis: Parse .pyc files to extract module import statements

integrity_verification.security_scanning: Archive scanned for malicious files before compression (see archive lifecycle policy)
integrity_verification.file_integrity: SHA-256 hashes generated and stored in {archive_name}.hashes.json
integrity_verification.tampering_detection: Hash verification available for integrity validation
integrity_verification.scan_results: See archive compression results in scheduler logs for security scan details

quick_start.step_1: Query this ARCHIVE_INDEX.json for content overview and categories
quick_start.step_2: Identify relevant files by purpose (code_archaeology, compliance_history, etc.)
quick_start.step_3: Use search capabilities to locate specific content
quick_start.step_4: Reference file categories for expected content types and formats

common_tasks.find_development_utilities: Search by 'source_code' category; includes diagnosis.py, fix_syntax.py, etc.
common_tasks.trace_policy_evolution: Search by 'documentation' category; includes POLICY_VIOLATION_PREVENTION.md, etc.
common_tasks.recover_module_state: Examine .pyc bytecode timestamps and import statements

limitations.bytecode_decompilation: .pyc files require decompiler to recover full source (recommended: uncompyle6, pycdc)
limitations.timestamp_precision: Bytecode timestamps reflect compilation time, not archival time (see creation_date)
limitations.configuration_format: .txt files may require parsing to extract structured data
limitations.access_restrictions: Archive is read-only; modifications require admin approval

lifecycle_information.access_logging: All archive access logged for audit trail (see scheduler logs)
